name: ICSLABALAMAPreparations
title: ICS LABA LAMA Preparations
publisher: NHLBI Implementation Science and Health Care Innovation Steward
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This valueset contains oral inhaled corticosteroid preparations in combination with a long-acting beta agonist and a long-acting muscarinic antagonist that may be used for maintenance controller therapy in adult asthmatics.  As of Sept 2020, the oral inhalant combination of fluticasone furoate + umeclidinium + vilanterol is indicated for the maintenance treatment of asthma in patients aged 18 years and older.),(Data Element Scope: FHIR 
MedicationStatement.medicationCodeableConcept, MedicationRequest.medicationCodeableConcept),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes fluticasone/umeclidinium/vilanterol oral inhalation preparations),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
